courses: Structural Health Monitoring, A short-term online course under Management Development Program (MDP) on Smart Infrastructure and Sustainability organized by IITJ Technology Innovation and Start-up Center (IIT-TISC), Indian Institute of Technology Jodhpur, India, 03-07 January 2022.
